page.title: 03A Day at Temple Newsam II
page.content: We saw some lads from my street and they came over to talk to us. They didn't have anything to eat or drink so we gave them some of ours. When we had finished eating we decided to have a game of{rounders}but the boys wanted a game of{football. The youngest boy, Jason, hit the ball too hard and it went in the{lake. I was messing about and I said I would go in for it, so John, the eldest, pushed me in. They all just looked at me and laughed. I got back out and told them I wasn't going for it; I was only joking. They told me to go and get it, now I was already wet, or else they would push me in again. So I went into the{lake}and got the ball. When I got home my friends came for me, but I took some Coldrex and went to bed.
